table_foot: The corpus callosum tracts are divided into 6 distinct segments: frontal, temporal, parietal, occipital, precentral gyrus and postcentral gyrus. The SLF tract was only traced in the left hemisphere as it tends to be highly asymmetrical in population studies (Catani et al. 2007). For each fiber tract, we indicate the total number of fibers included in the atlas template that we used for our population studies
